A:看电视 The function of “所需时间” is supposed to be the “time required” by an action. But it can also be used in an aspectual function, where it is used as a quantifier to express “the time required” by an action in the perfective aspect. In this case, it is never in the pre-or post-position. The action is assumed to be completed at the time of talking. Ex: “所需时间” can be used to express the duration of an action, whether or not it is completed. Ex: 一般现在时 我写了5万字小说. (I have written a novel of 50,000 words.)
Ex: 一般
